content:
Is there something we can do to show how a given IG version is or not compatible with prior versions?
Example: We want BE2020 profiles to be compatible with BE2019 profiles. Or at least to compare them both and document the things that will no longer work.
you can use the profile comparison tool
Yes, manually. How about as part of the publication?
I can try and add something to my template's ant.xml to run the comparison - would that be a good path?
the output of the comparison is not simple
there's no way to include it in an IG at this time, and doing something in ant wouldn't get you there
i thought the comparison could output an xml
it's a whole set of html files at this time, so you can see browse around the analysis
